transformations.name: MappingAttributes
transformations.description: Renaming the attributes and remove duplicates

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		country as string,
		address as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CustomerSource
CustomerSource select(mapColumn(
		SourceID = id,
		FirstName = first_name,
		LastName = last_name,
		Email = email,
		Gender = gender,
		Country = country,
		Address = address
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MappingAttributes
MappingAttributes derive(Gender = case( Gender=='Male','Male',Gender=='Female','Female',NULL )) ~> ValidateGender
